job.title: Software Engineer, Web
job.description:
Job Summary:

We are looking for a talented front-end engineer to join a team that creates large-scale, highly-performant web applications. This team transforms large, complex datasets into fast and responsive user interfaces used by millions of people.

As a Software Engineer for Web (Full Stack), you will help us push the boundaries of what is possible on the client. You'll work with a team of other developers alongside systems engineers, services engineers and project managers. You are highly proficient in JavaScript, HTML and CSS and appreciate the details that make a user experience exceptional. You demonstrate enthusiasm for new technologies, languages, frameworks, and platforms.

We believe we offer unique opportunities for any technologist, including:

  • The ability to work on a bleeding edge technology stack.
  • Influencing the innovation of products used globally by millions.
  • An open, team-driven environment that fosters constructive feedback and collective problem-solving

Responsibilities:

  • Implement web interfaces and applications using JavaScript (ES6+), HTML and CSS.
  • Work on a modern stack including React, NodeJS, Amazon Web Services.
  • Enforce code quality through test driven development.
  • Distill product requirements into design and technical specifications.
  • Collaborate closely with other engineering, product, and marketing teams to define product requirements.

Basic Qualifications:

  • 2-3+ years of experience building web applications.
  • Experience in a NodeJS application development environment.
  • Experience working within a modern JavaScript workflow through technologies such as: GitHub, CSS Preprocessors, Styled Components, Single Page Application frameworks and Module Bundlers (Webpack etc.)
  • Proven ability to integrate with service APIs and/or SDKs.
  • Experience with root-cause analysis and troubleshooting infrastructure issues.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Experience with streaming video, e-commerce, large data applications and analytics suites.
  • Hands on experience with React/Redux in a production application.

Required Education

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field or equivalent work experience
